== Kandalloor (CT) (628264) ==

Kandalloor (CT) is a town in the [[Karthikappally]] taluka of [[Alappuzha]] district with an area of 9.74 sq. km. and harbouring 5387 households with total population of 19925 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Alappuzha]] is at a distance of 50 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 115 km. Male population is 9068 and female population is 10857. Scheduled Caste population is 1365 and Scheduled Tribes population is 47. Census Location Code of the town is 628264<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class IV (population_total 10,000 to 19,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Alappuzha (m + og) at a distance of 50 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 97 km. Railway station is at Kayamkulam at a distance of 5 km.
